e2e.description: When true, `ng e2e` will be added or updated to use Cypress.
e2e.x-prompt: Would you like the default `ng e2e` command to use Cypress? [ Protractor to Cypress Migration Guide: https://on.cypress.io/protractor-to-cypress?cli=true ]

ct.description: When true, `ng ct` will be added to run Cypress component tests.
ct.x-prompt: Would you like to add Cypress component testing?  This will add a new command `ng ct` and add files needed for Cypress component testing.

addCtSpecs.description: When true, Cypress component tests will be added alongside `.component` files.
addCtSpecs.x-prompt: Would you like to add Cypress component tests alongside your existing components?
